conference.conference_tip: Connect a caller to a Meet-Me conference bridge
conference.conference_service_tip: Transfer the caller to the conference call service, prompting for both a conference number and a pin

device.device_tip: Ring a VoIP or cell phone or other device
device.connect_caller_to_device: Connect a caller to a device...
device.allow_this_device_to_call_itself: Allow this device to call itself.
device.when_you_check_this_box: When you check this box, calls from the user's own extension to themselves will not ring the extension. This allows them to dial their own number to get to voicemail.
device.name: Name
device.belongs_to_data_content: Select the owner of this device
device.number_data_content: Outside number you wish to reach
device.require_key_press_data_content: Do you want to require a key press to answer this call
device.keep_caller_id_data_content: If set to true it will use the caller-id of the caller
device.hide_from_contact_list_data_content: By checking this box, this endpoint will not be added automatically to the contact list of the devices of this platform
device.expire_seconds_data_content: Enter the expiration time of this device (in seconds)
device.closed_groups_data_content: If checked, this device will only be able to call the devices that are part of the same groups
device.caller_id_name_data_content: Define the Caller ID Name of this Device for In-House Calls (max. 30 chars).
device.caller_id_number_data_content: Define the Caller ID Number of this Device for In-House Calls.
device.caller_id_name_data_content2: Define the Caller ID Name of this Device for Outbound Calls (max. 30 chars).
device.caller_id_number_data_content2: Define the Caller ID Number of this Device for Outbound Calls.
device.caller_id_name_data_content3: Define the Caller ID Name of this Device for Emergency Calls (max. 30 chars).
device.caller_id_number_data_content3: Define the Caller ID Number of this Device for Emergency Calls.
device.music_on_hold_data_content: Select the media file that you want to be played by default when it's not set on a user or a device.
device.peer_to_peer_audio_data_content: Select the kind of Peer-to-Peer that you would like to set on this device
device.secure_rtp_help: Select if you want to enable SRTP or ZRTP to encrypt the audio for this device
device.t_38_data_content: When this option is enabled the media servers will attempt to use T.38 between this device/resource and the server.
device.ignore_completed_elsewhere_data_content: When checked supporting phones will show a call missed if it was part of a ring group answered elsewhere.
device.device_mac_address_data_content: Enter the MAC Address of this device formatted like: 1A:B2:C6:78:F0:3B
device.notify_when_unregistered_data_content: Do you want to notify the administrator each time this device unregisters
device.outbound_flags_data_content: Enter outbound flags this device requires to be present on the carrier(s). Type a comma between each flag in order to have multiple outbound flags (ex: flag1, flag2, flag3)
device.internal_ringtones_data_content: The alert info SIP header added when the call is from internal sources
device.external_ringtones_data_content: The alert info SIP header added when the call is from external sources
device.url_data_content: Enter the SIP url. Must look like 'sip:support@company.com'
device.this_mac_address_is_already_in_use: This MAC Address is already in use, please verify that it is correct.
device.there_were_errors_on_the_form: There were errors on the form, please correct!
device.are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this device?

menu.menu_tip: Ask a caller to push a menu option or dial an extension number
menu.name: Name
menu.prompt_record_pin_data_content: PIN to enter in order to allow users to record their own greetings
menu.allow_caller_to_dial_extensions_data_con: Check to allow the user to dial extensions from this menu
menu.greeting_message_data_content: Select the Greeting message that you want to use for this menu. If you select - Not set -, then no media file will be played.
menu.whitelist_of_numbers_data_content: List of numbers that users are allowed to dial when hunting (ex: ^[0-9]{0,11}$ is a simple regex catching a group of 0 to 11 numbers)
menu.blacklist_of_numbers_data_content: List of numbers that users are not allowed to dial when hunting (ex: ^[0-9]{0,11}$ is a simple regex catching a group of 0 to 11 numbers)
menu.number_of_retries_on_misdial_data_conten: Number of allowed retries when misdialing in this menu.
menu.timeout_for_dialing_data_content: Number of seconds allowed without pressing any key.
menu.extension_number_length_data_content: The maximum length of an extension. By default, it is set to the Record PIN number length.
menu.allow_outside_recording_data_content: This option allows someone to dial into a menu from an outside number (i.e. their cell phone, landline, etc.) and enter the PIN for the menu to be able to re-record it.
menu.suppress_playing_of_invalid_entry_data_c: This option, when checked, will suppress the playing of 'Invalid Entry'.
menu.there_were_errors_on_the_form: There were errors on the form, please correct!
menu.are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this menu?

resource.global_carrier_tip: Route calls to the phone network through pre-configured service providers
resource.account_carrier_tip: Route calls to the phone network through a configured SIP provider, Google Voice or physical digital/analog line

oldCallflows.please_select_valid_number: Please select a valid number by click in the grey boxes of the Callflow box.
oldCallflows.this_callflow_has_not_been_created: This callflow has not been created or doesn\'t exist anymore.
oldCallflows.monster_callflow_error: This callflow was created via the Monster UI. At this time, the Kazoo UI callflow editor is not compatible to edit Monster-UI Callflows.
oldCallflows.are_you_sure: Are you sure you want to delete this callflow?
oldCallflows.giving_a_name_to_a_callflow: Giving a name to a callflow isn't mandatory. Leave the field blank and the callflow will be displayed in the left listing as the list of numbers used in this callflow.
oldCallflows.you_didnt_select: You didn\'t select a valid phone number.
oldCallflows.this_number_is_already_attached: This number is already attached to a callflow
oldCallflows.ring_group_tip: Ring several VoIP or cell phones in order or at the same time
oldCallflows.callflow_tip: Transfer the call to another call flow
oldCallflows.page_group_tip: Ring several VoIP or cell phones
oldCallflows.group_pickup_tip: Setup the group pickup feature for a user, device or a group.
oldCallflows.receive_fax_tip: Directs a fax to a specific user
oldCallflows.disa_tip: DISA allows external callers to make outbound calls as though they originated from the system
oldCallflows.response_tip: Return a custom SIP error code
oldCallflows.enable_call_forwarding_tip: Enable call forwarding (using the last forwaded number)
oldCallflows.dynamic_cid_tip: Set your CallerId by entering it on the phone
oldCallflows.prepend_tip: Prepend Caller ID with a text.
oldCallflows.reset_prepend_tip: Reset all the prepended texts before the Caller ID.
oldCallflows.you_have_modified_this_callflow: You have modified this Callflow, don't forget to save it!
oldCallflows.drag_items_below_on_top: Drag items below on top of other items on the left
oldCallflows.connect_caller_to_another_callflow: Connect a caller to another callflow...
oldCallflows.sends_fax_to_user: Sends a fax to a user...
oldCallflows.by_checking_this_box: By checking this box, this endpoint will not be added automatically to the contact list of the devices of this platform
oldCallflows.you_need_to_select_a_number: You need to select a number for this callflow before saving it.
oldCallflows.the_owner_of_this_device_is_already: The owner of this device is already in the ring group. By adding this device, you will remove the User from this ring group. Would you like to continue anyway?
oldCallflows.this_user_has_already_some_devices: This user has already some devices belonging to him in this ring group. By adding him to the ring group, you will remove devices that were already in the ring group. Would you like to continue anyway?
oldCallflows.not_setting_a_pin: Not setting a PIN is a security risk, are you sure you don\'t want to set a PIN?
oldCallflows.please_enter_a_valide_sip_code: Please enter a valide SIP code.
oldCallflows.this_callflow_is_outdated: This callflow is outdated, please resave this callflow before continuing.
oldCallflows.language_tip: This callflow action lets you change the language of the prompts used in this callflow!
